backend/main.mo: Main backend canister handling user profiles, article CRUD with access control, and public/admin article queries with timestamp sorting.
backend/migration.mo: Simple migration module passing through existing article and profile data unchanged while preserving nextArticleId.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of high-level summaries describing the purpose and behavior of all major frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document setting metadata, favicon, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the TanStack Router configuration, public and admin routes, and wraps the app with theming and notifications.
Slug input component enforcing URL-safe formatting and uniqueness validation with real‑time feedback.
Tag editor component allowing adding and removing tags with keyboard and button interactions.
frontend/src/components/articles/Article: Renders a responsive grid of article cards with masked titles, excerpts, tags, and metadata, skipping invalid entries. Generates short excerpts from markdown and links each card to its article page.
frontend/src/components/articles/TagFilt: Displays a selectable list of tags with a clear button, allowing users to filter articles by tag.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Shows an access denied message with an icon and a button linking back to the home page.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Protects admin routes by checking authentication, admin status, and profile setup, showing loading or access-denied screens when appropriate.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity, handling login states, errors, and cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Prompts new users to enter their name and saves their profile via a modal form.
frontend/src/components/content/Markdown: Converts masked markdown content to sanitized HTML using custom parsing and renders it safely.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the main site layout with header, navigation (including admin links), mobile menu, and footer, wrapping all page content.
frontend/src/config/publicContact.ts: Exports centralized public contact information including email, LinkedIn, and GitHub links.
frontend/src/content/articleTemplates.ts: Provides predefined article templates with metadata and markdown content for seeding or static display.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, admin status, and articles through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind styles and defines a neon dark theme with custom components and typography rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page describing mission, AI governance work, recruitment focus, and contact options.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard listing all articles with actions for deleting, publishing, bulk recreating templates, and creating/updating template-based articles.
frontend/src/pages/admin/ArticleEditorPa: Admin article editor for creating or editing articles, loading templates, modifying fields, and publishing changes.
frontend/src/pages/ArticleDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single article by slug with loading, error handling, metadata, and markdown rendering.
frontend/src/pages/ArticlesIndexPage.tsx: Displays published articles with search, tag filtering, loading, and error states.
frontend/src/pages/AttritionPage.tsx: Marketing page explaining INVARIANT’s attrition prediction features with sections, visuals, and CTAs.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page presenting INVARIANT’s recruitment intelligence with hero content, product intro, and navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/InvariantPage.tsx: Showcases INVARIANT’s cognitive architecture with hero messaging, descriptions, and feature sections.
frontend/src/pages/RecruitmentPage.tsx: Explains INVARIANT’s recruitment intelligence capabilities with promotional sections and navigation actions.
frontend/src/utils/articleDate.ts: Utility for safely converting backend nanosecond timestamps to JS Dates and formatting them with fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/layerMask.ts: Provides mapping and masking utilities to replace proprietary substrate names with generic Layer labels.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence and hash-route support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration defining theme extensions, animations, typography, and included plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing current project state, known issues, and pending feature requests related to fixing the Articles system.
